creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: right scroll: figure wearing black face mask in pose with legs slightly apart, PR arm held out and down with bells in PR hand; PL arm bent upward behind figure holding decorated fan; figure wears blue kimono and tall black hat
markings: LRC; sticker R roller end with Japanese character
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
signed: LRC: 顕幽齋源一信寫{Kenyūsai Minamoto Kazunobu sha}
title: Senzai [right of a triptych of the Noh roles Senzai, Okina, and Sanbaso]
